master.description: The URL of the Mesos master.

framework-name.description: The name of the framework. Until this is configurable, please do not change this from it's default value.

cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each MemSQL scheduler instance.

mem.description: Memory (MB) to allocate to each MemSQL scheduler instance.

instances.description: Number of MemSQL scheduler instances to run.

enabled.description: Whether framework authentication should be used

principal.description: The Mesos principal used for authentication.

secret.description: The path to the Mesos secret file containing the authentication secret.

zk.description: ZooKeeper URL for storing state. Format: host1:port1
